Use the following links to download the Oregon bird census data files.

The census metadata:

- [birdhab_metadata.pdf](/eco_602_634_2020/data/birdhab_metadata.pdf)


Bird census data:

- [bird.sta.csv](/eco_602_634_2020/data/bird.sta.csv)


Census location habitat data:

- [hab.sta.csv](/eco_602_634_2020/data/hab.sta.csv)

Merge The data

1. Read the bird census data file into a `data.frame` called `dat_bird` using `read.csv()`
1. Read the census locations habitat data file into a `data.frame` called `dat_sta` using `read.csv()`

The datasets have the following columns in common:

- `basin`
- `sub`
- `sta`

Use `merge()` to combine them into a single data frame using the common columns.

- The `by` argument specifies which columns to match in the two original dataframes.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
dat_all = merge(
  dat_bird, 
  dat_habitat,
  by = c("basin", "sub", "sta"))
```
